material.mattext: According to a study done by the Golden Retriever Club of America using 548 dogs, the average age at death of a golden retriever is 11.0 years. If the standard deviation of the lifespan of golden retrievers is known to be 1.3 years, estimate µ with a 95% confidence interval.
The interval is (10.9, 11.1), and is calculated using the following formula:
